attributes.action: Stop the sale process of DARA Rotary Wing and Components business conducted at DARA Fleetlands and DARA Almondbank and keep these sites and capabillity within the MoD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With military operations ongoing in Afghanistan and Iraq and the vital role that helicopters have within these theatres, We deplore the MoD's ongoing drive to sell and privatise the MoD's only owned and controlled helicopter repair and overhaul facility's, and to sell this critical capability to a foreign owned company. We believe that privatising and selling this capability is an unjustified gamble and call the Prime Minister to keep this capability within the MoD.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the sale process of DARA Rotary Wing and Components business conducted at DARA Fleetlands and DARA Almondbank and keep these sites and capabillity within the MoD."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14761.asp

Prime Minister's Office
